metadrc methods

Methods for objects of class metadrc

# S3 method for metadrc
df.residual(object, ...)
# S3 method for metadrc
vcov(object, ...)
# S3 method for metadrc
coef(object, ...)
# S3 method for metadrc
coefficients(object, ...)
# S3 method for metadrc
print(x, digits = max(3, getOption("digits") - 3), ...)
# S3 method for metadrc
summary(object, digits = max(3, getOption("digits") - 3), ...)
# S3 method for metadrc
confint(object, parm, level=0.95, fixed=TRUE, random=FALSE, ...)

Arguments

object

An object of class metadrc
x

An object of class metadrc
parm

parm argument in confint function
digits

An integer giving the number of digits of the parameter coefficients. Default is 3.
level

confidence level, default 0.95
fixed

if TRUE, confidence limits for population parameters are returned
random

if TRUE, confidence limits for variance parameters are returned, see metafor package
...

further arguments
